tool_description: Executes performance benchmarks by running queries against the database and measuring execution times, resource usage, and throughput metrics.

database_host.description: Database server hostname or IP address

database_name.description: Name of the database to benchmark

username.description: Database username with query execution permissions

iterations.description: Number of times to run each query for average timing

warmup_runs.description: Number of warmup executions before timing

timeout_seconds.description: Maximum execution time per query in seconds

error_messages: Database connection failed: Unable to connect to database with provided credentials.
Query execution error: One or more queries failed to execute successfully.
Benchmark timeout: Query execution exceeded the specified timeout limit.
Invalid parameters: iterations and warmup_runs must be positive integers.
Too many queries: Maximum 50 queries can be benchmarked in a single run.
Insufficient permissions: User lacks permissions to execute benchmark queries.
usage: Provide database connection details and benchmark_queries array. Set iterations higher for more accurate timing, warmup_runs to handle cold cache effects. Adjust timeout_seconds for long-running queries.

average_execution_times.description: Average execution time in milliseconds for each query

min_execution_times.description: Minimum execution time in milliseconds for each query

max_execution_times.description: Maximum execution time in milliseconds for each query

total_benchmark_time.description: Total time spent running all benchmarks in seconds
